UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The effects of incorporation of the counterparts and mimics of l-lysine on the antimicrobial activity, hemolytic activity, cytotoxicity and tryptic stability of antimicrobial peptide polybia-MPII.
Literature.Author: Liang X, Liu K, Zhao P, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:70% Cytotoxicity=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>256µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>256µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>256µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 43827(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>256µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>256µM),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC 29544(MIC=>256µM),Candida glabrata ATCC 2001(MIC=16µM),Candida glabrata ATCC 2001(MFC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MFC=16µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 750(MIC=4µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 750(MFC=8µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=16µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MFC=32µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=64µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MFC=64µM)
